item.title: Trump Ate My Climate Plan
item.description: By withdrawing from the Paris accord, Trump is offering a number of nations a helpful excuse for dodging commitments they had little intention of keep...

item.title: Trump Must Put an End to Biden’s Environmental Injustice
item.description: Nobody did this to you, environmental activists. You did it to yourselves.

item.title: Birthright Citizenship: The Supreme Court Precedents Loom Large
item.description: Trump can only win his case by getting the Supreme Court to overrule its own precedent or reject its reasoning.

item.title: Trump Repairs the U.S.-Israel Relationship
